  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayUtil
    ArrayUtil collects together some Array utility methods.
    Authentication
    Authentication is a utility class that implements the Authentication interface.
    BaseDbBinarySingleStorage
    BaseDbSingleStorage is a class that stores Resources (of some type) in a database,
    provides locked access, and generally implements a services "storage" class.
    BaseDbDoubleStorage
    BaseDbDoubleStorage is a class that stores Resources (of some type) in a database,
    provides locked access, and generally implements a services "storage" class.
    BaseDbDualSingleStorage
    BaseDbSingleStorage is a class that stores Resources (of some type) in a database,
    provides locked access, and generally implements a services "storage" class.
    BaseDbFlatStorage
    BaseDbFlatStorage is a class that stores Resources (of some type) in a database, provides (optional) locked access,
    and generally implements a services "storage" class.
    BaseDbSingleStorage
    BaseDbSingleStorage is a class that stores Resources (of some type) in a database,
    provides locked access, and generally implements a services "storage" class.
    BaseDelivery
    BaseDelivery is a base class for all Delivery objects.
    BaseResourceProperties
    BaseResourceProperties is the base class for ResourceProperties implementations.
    BaseResourcePropertiesEdit
    BaseResourceProperties is the base class for ResourcePropertiesEdit implementations.
    BaseXmlFileStorage
    BaseXmlFileStorage is a class that stores Resources (of some type) in an XML file
    backed memory store, provides locked access, and generally implements a service's
    "storage" class.
    BasicAuth
    This is implemented in a filter, since most httpclients (i.e. non browser clients) don't know what to do with a redirect.
    BasicConfigHistory
    This is a basic version of the Config history to make it easy for people to create items to place in the config history
    BasicConfigItem
    Provides an easy for someone to create a ServerConfigurationService.ConfigItem which is valid without having to build their own implementation Use the static methods to easily generate the ServerConfigurationService.ConfigItem for use with the methods in the ServerConfigurationService
    Blob
    A blob is a Binary Large OBject.
    ByteStorageConversion
    Bytes are signed in Java, if we store them in a char we will consume the top 128 characters of a char range, rather than do that we are going to unsign a byte before storing it in a char, that way the range 0-127 is still readable, and the range 128-255 does not cosume masses of memory.
    CalendarChannelReferenceMaker
    Callback class so that we can form references in a generic way.
    CalendarReferenceToChannelConverter
    Used by callback to convert channel references to channels.
    CalendarUtil
    CalendarUtil is a bunch of utility methods added to a java Calendar object.
    ComponentMap
    ComponentMap exposes the registered components as a map - the component id is mapped to the component implementation.
    ComponentsLoader
    Load the available Sakai components into the shared component manager's Spring ApplicationContext
    ContextLoaderListener
    Sakai's extension to the Spring ContextLoaderListener - use our ContextLoader, and increment / decrement the child count of the ComponentManager on init / destroy.
    DbResourceBundle
    An extension of ResourceBundle which gets the bundle data in the normal way and then consults with the MessageBundleService for addition data.
    DbSingleStorageReader  
    DefaultEntityHandler
    This class is required by the SAX parser to parse into.
    DirectRefreshDelivery
    DirectRefreshDelivery is a Delivery that does a direct location refresh.
    DoubleStorageSqlDb2
    methods for accessing double storage data in a db2 database.
    DoubleStorageSqlDefault
    methods for accessing double storage data in a database.
    DoubleStorageSqlHSql
    methods for accessing double storage data in a hypersonic sql database.
    DoubleStorageSqlMsSql
    methods for accessing double storage data in an ms sql server database.
    DoubleStorageSqlMySql
    methods for accessing double storage data in a mysql database.
    DoubleStorageSqlOracle
    methods for accessing double storage data in an oracle database.
    EditorConfiguration
    EditorConfiguration is a utility class that provides methods to access information that is relevant to the configuration of a rich-text editor.
    EmailNotification
    EmailNotification is the notification action that handles the act of message (email) based notify, site related, with user preferences.
    EmptyIterator Deprecated
    use commons-collection instead, this will be removed after 2.9 - Dec 2011
    EntityCollections
    EntityUtil collects some entity utility methods dealing with collections of entities and entity references.
    EntityReaderAdapter
    This class provides a bridge between the XML serializers and the non XML serializers, so that whatever the deployed serializer, exisitng Blobs can be read.
    EntryProvider
    Provides a list of merged calendars by iterating through all available calendars.
    EnumerationIterator Deprecated
    use commons-collection instead, this will be removed after 2.9 - Dec 2011
    EventObservingCourier
    EventObservingCourier is an ObservingCourier that watches Events, of a particular reference root.
    ExternalTrustedEvidence
    ExternalTrustedEvidence is a utility class that implements the ExternalTrustedEvidence interface.

    NoisierDefaultListableBeanFactory
    In Spring 1.2.6 and 1.2.8, when there's a problem pre-instantiating any singleton bean, all existing singleton beans are immediately destroyed.
    ObservingCourier
    ObservingCourier is an observer which uses the courier service to notify when things change.
    ParameterParser
    ParameterParser is a wrapper over the request that provides compatibility with Sakai 1.5 and before.
    PasswordCheck Deprecated
    unused as of 12 Dec 2011, planned for removal after 2.9
    PathHashUtil Deprecated
    unused as of 12 Dec 2011, planned for removal after 2.9
    Placement
    Placement is a utility class that implements the Placement interface.
    PresenceObservingCourier
    PresenceObservingCourier is an EventObservingCourier which watches for only presence service events at a particular location, and delivers a direct refresh delivery.
    RemoteHostFilter
    This Servlet Filter allows/denies requests based on comparing the remote hostname and/or ip-address against a set of regular expressions configured in the init parameters.
    RequestFilter
    RequestFilter Filters all requests to Sakai tools.
    Resource
    This class allows a resource bundle to be made accessible though a spring bean.
    ResourceLoader
    ResourceLoader provides an alternate implementation of org.util.ResourceBundle, dynamically selecting the prefered locale from either the user's session or from the user's sakai preferences
    ResourceLoaderMessageSource
    Created by IntelliJ IDEA.
    ResponseHeaderFilter
    ResponseHeaderFilter is responsible for adding response headers to the HttpServletResponses.
    ReversiblePropertyOverrideConfigurer
    This is just a version of Spring's PropertyOverrideConfigurer that lets the bean name be specified Sakai-style before the property name instead of after.
    SakaiApplicationContext
    Hook some Sakai-specific operations into the normal ApplicationContext refresh cycle: read component manager configuration files, give creators of PostProcessor objects (e.g., SakaiProperties) a chance to do their work, and load a few central components before the rest.
    SakaiComponentEvent
    Sakai specific events.
    SakaiProperties
    A configurer for "sakai.properties" files.
    SakaiPropertyPromoter
    Some Sakai properties have traditionally also been exposed as Java system properties.
    ServerCookie
    Server-side cookie representation.
    SingleStorageSqlDb2
    methods for accessing single storage data in a db2 database.

    SingleStorageSqlMySql

    SingleStorageSqlOracle
    methods for accessing single storage data in an oracle database.
    SiteEmailNotification
    SiteEmailNotification is an EmailNotification that selects the site's participants (based on site access) as the recipients of the notification.
    SortedIterator Deprecated

    TestDelivery
    TestDelivery is a simple Delivery class for automated testing.
    ToolListener
    Webapp listener to detect webapp-housed tool registration.
    TrustedLoginFilter
    A filter to come after the standard sakai request fileter to allow services to encode a token containing the user id accessing the service.
    UserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl
    Here's an example of what the xml bean would look like: <bean id="org.sakaiproject.user.api.UserNotificationPreferencesRegistration.content" parent="org.sakaiproject.user.api.UserNotificationPreferencesRegistration" class="org.sakaiproject.content.user.prefs.ContentUserNotificationPreferencesRegistrationImpl" init-method="init" singleton="true"> <property name="serverConfigurationService" ref="org.sakaiproject.component.api.ServerConfigurationService"/> <property name="bundleLocation"><value>org.sakaiproject.localization.bundle.content.content</value></property> <property name="sectionTitleBundleKey"><value>prefs_title</value></property> <property name="sectionDescriptionBundleKey"><value>prefs_description</value></property> <property name="overrideSectionTitleBundleKey"><value>prefs_title_override</value></property> <property name="defaultValue"><value>3</value></property> <property name="type"><value>sakai:content</value></property> <property name="prefix"><value>rsrc</value></property> <property name="toolId"><value>sakai.resources</value></property> <property name="rawOptions"> <map> <entry key="1"><value>prefs_opt1</value></entry> <entry key="2"><value>prefs_opt2</value></entry> <entry key="3"><value>prefs_opt3</value></entry> </map> </property> <property name="overrideBySite"><value>false</value></property> <property name="expandByDefault"><value>true</value></property> </bean>
    Validator Deprecated

    use apache commons utils for FormattedText, this will be removed after 2.9 - Dec 2011
